Description:
### **Get Ready for Microsoft Ignite**

Welcome back to our Azure Tech Community Microsoft Ignite 2025 series!

If you joined us for [Your Guide to Azure Community Activations at Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/azure-events/your-guide-to-azure-community-activations-at-microsoft-ignite-2025/4455501), you already know that Ignite isn’t just about product updates, it’s where ideas, innovation, and community come together.

With hundreds of sessions across every area of Azure, it can be hard to know where to focus. That’s why we’ve curated a list of sessions tailored specifically for **IT Pros** to help you make the most of your time, strengthen your technical strategy, and get inspired for the year ahead.

Use the Ignite session scheduler feature in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) to personalize your agenda, save your favorites, and organize your time at Ignite.

### **Make Every Minute Count: Top Recommended Sessions for IT Pros**

Microsoft Ignite moves fast, so it pays to plan your path before you arrive.

By organizing your schedule around your interests and goals, you’ll be able to maximize learning opportunities, connect with peers, and leave with actionable insights.

The recommendations below highlight our top picks for IT Pros looking to streamline operations, strengthen security, and stay ahead in an evolving cloud landscape.

1. [***End-to-End migration of applications with AI Agents to IaaS and PaaS***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK140?source=sessions) *(BRK140*)
See how Azure’s new AI-powered migration agents can simplify and accelerate every stage of your migration journey—from assessment to deployment.
2. [***Architecting for resiliency on Azure Infrastructure***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK178?source=sessions) **** *(*BRK178) Discover how to build resilient cloud solutions on Azure by leveraging availability zones, multi-region deployments, and fungible products. This session explores architectural patterns, platform capabilities, and best practices.

1. [***Migrate and Modernize Windows and SQL Server Workloads with Azure***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/LAB506-R1?source=sessions) **** *(LAB506-R1)*
Get hands-on with practical approaches to moving core enterprise workloads to Azure, improving reliability, and optimizing costs.
2. [***Govern your estate using PowerShell and the CLI with AI***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK170?source=sessions) **** (BRK170)
Discover how you can use AI for PowerShell and Azure CLI to boost automation and simplify complex commands.
3. [***Turning Compliance Burden into Competitive Advantage with RegScale***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/THR820?source=sessions) (THR820)
Explore how to use Microsoft’s compliance and governance frameworks to drive efficiency and differentiation.

Before diving into your targeted sessions, make time for these essential moments that set the stage for everything happening at Ignite.

1. [***Opening Keynote***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/KEY01?source=sessions) **** *(KEY01)*
Hear from Microsoft leaders as they unveil the latest innovations shaping the future of AI, cloud, and the developer ecosystem. This is the session that sets the tone for the entire event.
2. [***Innovation Session: Security in the Agentic Era – the Core Primitive***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK1712?source=sessions) ***(****BRK1712)*
Gain a forward-looking perspective on how the rise of Agentic AI will reshape the security landscape for IT operations and enterprise systems.
3. [**Innovation Session: Scale Smarter: Infrastructure for the Agentic Era**](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK1704?source=sessions) *(BRK1704)*
Dive into what’s new in Azure Infrastructure—from compute and networking to hybrid management and scalability. Hear from Azure engineering experts on best practices and innovations for modern cloud operations.

### **Plan Smarter with the Session Scheduler**

With the **“** **add to schedule** **”** **** **feature** in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) you’ll be able to:

- Browse and filter all Ignite sessions by topic, product, or persona.
- Save your favorite sessions to build a personalized schedule.
- Set reminders and block time for networking, community booths, and demos.

**Stay Connected with the Azure Tech Community**

Your Microsoft Ignite journey doesn’t stop when the sessions end, the conversation continues across the Azure Tech Community.

Share the sessions you’re most excited about using **#MSIgnite** **#AzureTechCommunity**, tag **[azure​](javascript:void%280%29)**, and connect with other IT Pros exploring the future of cloud management and security.

Follow the [Azure Tech Community](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/Azure) for real-time updates, announcements, and product news throughout Ignite.

### **See You at Microsoft Ignite 2025**

With the right plan in place, every session becomes an opportunity to learn, grow, and connect.

Explore these recommendations, save your favorites, and get ready for an unforgettable [Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/home) experience.
Title: Build Your Microsoft Ignite Schedule: Top Sessions for IT Pros
Author: GalimahB

## Plan your Microsoft Ignite experience around the topics that matter most to you

### **Get Ready for Microsoft Ignite**

Welcome back to our Azure Tech Community Microsoft Ignite 2025 series!

If you joined us for [Your Guide to Azure Community Activations at Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/azure-events/your-guide-to-azure-community-activations-at-microsoft-ignite-2025/4455501), you already know that Ignite isn’t just about product updates, it’s where ideas, innovation, and community come together.

With hundreds of sessions across every area of Azure, it can be hard to know where to focus. That’s why we’ve curated a list of sessions tailored specifically for **IT Pros** to help you make the most of your time, strengthen your technical strategy, and get inspired for the year ahead.

Use the Ignite session scheduler feature in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) to personalize your agenda, save your favorites, and organize your time at Ignite.

### **Make Every Minute Count: Top Recommended Sessions for IT Pros**

Microsoft Ignite moves fast, so it pays to plan your path before you arrive.

By organizing your schedule around your interests and goals, you’ll be able to maximize learning opportunities, connect with peers, and leave with actionable insights.

The recommendations below highlight our top picks for IT Pros looking to streamline operations, strengthen security, and stay ahead in an evolving cloud landscape.

1. [***End-to-End migration of applications with AI Agents to IaaS and PaaS***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK140?source=sessions) *(BRK140*)
See how Azure’s new AI-powered migration agents can simplify and accelerate every stage of your migration journey—from assessment to deployment.
2. [***Architecting for resiliency on Azure Infrastructure***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK178?source=sessions) **** *(*BRK178)                                                                                                                                            Discover how to build resilient cloud solutions on Azure by leveraging availability zones, multi-region deployments, and fungible products. This session explores architectural patterns, platform capabilities, and best practices.

1. [***Migrate and Modernize Windows and SQL Server Workloads with Azure***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/LAB506-R1?source=sessions) **** *(LAB506-R1)*
Get hands-on with practical approaches to moving core enterprise workloads to Azure, improving reliability, and optimizing costs.
2. [***Govern your estate using PowerShell and the CLI with AI***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK170?source=sessions) **** (BRK170)
Discover how you can use AI for PowerShell and Azure CLI to boost automation and simplify complex commands.
3. [***Turning Compliance Burden into Competitive Advantage with RegScale***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/THR820?source=sessions) (THR820)
Explore how to use Microsoft’s compliance and governance frameworks to drive efficiency and differentiation.

Before diving into your targeted sessions, make time for these essential moments that set the stage for everything happening at Ignite.

1. [***Opening Keynote***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/KEY01?source=sessions) **** *(KEY01)*
Hear from Microsoft leaders as they unveil the latest innovations shaping the future of AI, cloud, and the developer ecosystem. This is the session that sets the tone for the entire event.
2. [***Innovation Session: Security in the Agentic Era – the Core Primitive***](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK1712?source=sessions) ***(****BRK1712)*
Gain a forward-looking perspective on how the rise of Agentic AI will reshape the security landscape for IT operations and enterprise systems.
3. [**Innovation Session: Scale Smarter: Infrastructure for the Agentic Era**](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/BRK1704?source=sessions) *(BRK1704)*
Dive into what’s new in Azure Infrastructure—from compute and networking to hybrid management and scalability. Hear from Azure engineering experts on best practices and innovations for modern cloud operations.

### **Plan Smarter with the Session Scheduler**

With the **“** **add to schedule** **”** **** **feature** in the [session catalog](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions) you’ll be able to:

- Browse and filter all Ignite sessions by topic, product, or persona.
- Save your favorite sessions to build a personalized schedule.
- Set reminders and block time for networking, community booths, and demos.

**Stay Connected with the Azure Tech Community**

Your Microsoft Ignite journey doesn’t stop when the sessions end, the conversation continues across the Azure Tech Community.

Share the sessions you’re most excited about using **#MSIgnite** **#AzureTechCommunity**, tag **[azure​](javascript:void%280%29)**, and connect with other IT Pros exploring the future of cloud management and security.

Follow the [Azure Tech Community](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/Azure) for real-time updates, announcements, and product news throughout Ignite.

### **See You at Microsoft Ignite 2025**

With the right plan in place, every session becomes an opportunity to learn, grow, and connect.

Explore these recommendations, save your favorites, and get ready for an unforgettable [Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/home) experience.
